task.title: Marinara Sauce
task.shortdesc: Prepare a crowd-pleasing red sauce for pasta in about 30 minutes.

ul.li: 28 oz. of canned tomatoes, preferably San Marzano

taskbody.context: Prepare this sauce in the summer for an Italian-inspired afternoon

step.cmd: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan on medium
Add garlic and hot red pepper and sweat until fragrant
Add tomatoes, breaking up into smaller pieces
Simmer on medium-low heat for at least 20 minutes

step.stepxmp: Sprinke the parsley all over the saucepan

step.stepresult: The Marinara should be thicker than regular tomato sauce
